scoringPlays.text: Stevie Scott 13 Yd Run (Logan Justus Kick)
Nick Eubanks 41 Yd pass from Shea Patterson (Two-Point Pass Conversion Failed)
Ty Fryfogle 7 Yd pass from Peyton Ramsey (Logan Justus Kick)
Karan Higdon 2 Yd Run (Jake Moody Kick)

videos.headline: Big run by Indiana QB sets up TD
videos.description: Peyton Ramsey finds a lane through the Michigan defense for a 29-yard gain, setting up a 13-yard Indiana touchdown by Stevie Scott in the 1st quarter.

videos.headline: Michigan comes up with INT on Indiana's 1st drive
videos.description: Indiana QB Peyton Ramsey attempts to fit a pass into a tight window, but Michael Dwumfour hauls in an interception off the deflected pass for Michigan.

videos.headline: Patterson hits Eubanks in stride for TD
videos.description: Shea Patterson finds Nick Eubanks over the middle for a 41-yard touchdown to give Michigan the lead over Indiana in the 2nd quarter.

videos.headline: Long pass sets up Indiana TD
videos.description: Peyton Ramsey hits Nick Westbrook for a 41-yard completion, leading to a touchdown pass to Ty Fryfogle as Indiana retakes the lead over Michigan.

videos.headline: Higdon gives Michigan the lead with short TD
videos.description: Karan Higdon powers across the goal line from 2 yards out to give Michigan the lead back over Indiana in the 3rd quarter.

videos.headline: Patterson picked off in 3rd quarter
videos.description: Shea Patterson gets hit as he throws and Indiana's Marcelino Ball intercepts the pass in the 3rd quarter.

videos.headline: Michigan's Edwards carted off after Indiana ejection for targeting
videos.description: Michigan's Berkley Edwards is carted off the field on a stretcher following a hit by Indiana's Cam Jones, who is ejected for targeting.
